summary: **Adventure Time** is an American animated TV show created by Pendleton Ward. It follows Finn, a boy, and his dog brother Jake, who can change size and shape, as they have adventures in the magical Land of Ooo. They meet characters like Princess Bubblegum and the Ice King. The show started as a short film in 2007 and became a full series in 2010, ending in 2018 after 10 seasons. It was very popular and won many awards for being original and well-made. The show has also created spin-offs and lots of merchandise.
title: Adventure Time
